data.title: The Robert H. Smith
data.meta_description: [[{"fid":"317568","view_mode":"default","type":"media","attributes":{"style":"display: block; margin: 0px auto 20px; width: 120px; height: 120px; padding: 0px !important;","alt":"wolf-foundation-logo.png","class":"img-responsive media-element file-default"}}]][[{"fid":"317570","view_mode":"default","type":"media","attributes":{"style":"width: 80px; height: 97px; display: block; margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px !important;","alt":"wolf-prize-logo.png","class":"img-responsive media-element file-default "}}]]  The Wolf Prize is an international award granted in Israel to outstanding scientist
data.text:
Bus: Many bus lines stop in front of the Faculty, including lines 26, 164, 201, 274, 301, 367, 371

Train: The faculty is located a short walk south of the Rehovot train station. The train schedule is available here.

Car: Entrance for private cars must be arranged before visiting.
